alosiyasta wasi denna rawi gahapu gema heliweyi 2017-10-05 09:07:37 - 834 yi arjun alosiyasge parpachuwal tresharis samagamata rupiyal koti dasa dahas gananaka asimitha labha genadun aandolanathmaka bandumkara wendesi dekedima ewakata mudal amathi wu rawi karunanayakage illima matha rajya banku thunehima pradhaninta adu lansu idiripath karannata sidu wu bawa eeye (4da) maha banku bandumkara komisama hamuwedi ema pradhanin wisinma prakasha karanu labiya. 2016 marthu masa 29da shri lanka maha bankuwa wisin pawathwana lada bhandagara bandumkara wendesiyata pera dina enam marthu masa 28 wani dinada, 2016 marthu masa 31da shri lanka maha bankuwa wisin pawathwana lada bhandagara bandumkara wendesiyata pera dina enam marthu masa 30 wani dinada ewakata mudal amathi rawi karunanayaka wisin thaman amathyanshayata kandawa raswim dekak pawathwana lada bawada ema raswim dekehidima ekama aakarayen eki wendesiwaladi adu lansu idiripath karana lesa illa sitimin ema lansu pilibandawa simawanda thamanta mudal amathiwaraya wisinma laba dun bawada owuhu kiya sitiyaha.

samaharu, minissu andina palandina saha hasirime wenas ha suwisheshi wu jiwana wilasithawak hatiyata hipiyan artha dakwana gaman thawath aya kiyanne thahanam math drawya pawichchi karana, rok and rol sangithaya windina ho wiplawiya deshapalana dakmak athi aya kiyala.
